sentences.en: Casey Stengel was probably the most colorful character in baseball.
sentences.cn: 凯西·施滕格尔可能是棒球界最有趣的人物。

sentences.en: He has probably said goodbye to his last chance of Olympic gold.
sentences.cn: 他可能已经失去了夺取奥运会金牌的最后机会。

sentences.en: He is probably the most reviled man in contemporary theatre.
sentences.cn: 他可能是当代戏剧界骂声最多的人。

sentences.en: He was probably right to intuit that it was universal.
sentences.cn: 他凭直觉认为它具有普遍性，也许他是正确的。

sentences.en: I think more customers probably prefer a soft sell.
sentences.cn: 我认为更多的顾客也许更喜欢软性推销。

sentences.en: If there was any disappointment it was probably temporary.
sentences.cn: 即便有点儿失望，也肯定是暂时的。

sentences.en: It is probably the most polluted body of water in the world.
sentences.cn: 这很可能是世界上受污染最严重的一片水域。

sentences.en: Rest assured, he probably has rather more common sense than you realize.
sentences.cn: 放心吧，他知道的常识很可能比你以为的要多得多。

sentences.en: Retrospectively, it seems as if they probably were negligent.
sentences.cn: 回想起来，他们似乎很可能疏忽了。

sentences.en: Some people moved in silky, liquid movements, others were jerky, probably drunk.
sentences.cn: 一些人动作平稳流畅，其他人则跌跌撞撞，大概是喝醉了。

sentences.en: Swimming is probably the best form of exercise you can get.
sentences.cn: 游泳或许是现有的最佳锻炼方式。

sentences.en: The default is usually the setting that most users would probably choose.
sentences.cn: 默认选项通常是大多数用户都会选择的设置。

sentences.en: The right decision was made, but probably for the wrong reasons.
sentences.cn: 作出的决定是正确的，但理由可能是错误的。

sentences.en: The White House probably won't make this plan public until July.
sentences.cn: 白宫可能要到7月份才会公布这项计划。

sentences.en: Van Gogh is probably the best-known painter in the world.
sentences.cn: 梵高可能是世界上最知名的画家。

sentences.en: You were probably brought up to think like that.
sentences.cn: 你可能从小就被教育那样考虑问题。

sentences.en: Your non-conformist ways will probably get you into trouble.
sentences.cn: 你特立独行的行事方式可能会给自己惹来麻烦。

words.tran_cn: 可能性；机率；[数] 或然率
很可能的事；大有希望的候选者

trans.tran_en: used to say that sth is likely to happen or to be true
